p: Methanol, n-hexane and acetic acid of HPLC grade were purchased from Sinopharm Chemical Reagent Co., Ltd. (Shanghai, China). Ultra-pure water was obtained from a Milli-Q water purification apparatus (Millipore Co., Ltd., Milford, MA, USA). SPE cartridges bond with diol (500 mg, 6 cc) were purchased from water.
